name: A New Hope
description: The Milkyway no longer has any inhabitable planets left for human kind. The human race is doomed unless they can reach a newly discovered solar system with plenty of planets that are fit for human life. The catch is each planet is only suitable for specific needs. Some have lands best for farming, while others have precious metals. You will have to help guide each ship to the appropriate planet to ensure their skills will be put to their best abilities.
